text: Acabou deitando e acordando assustado com o despertador, já eram sete da manhã, precisava abrir a loja às nove mas antes passaria no hospital para visitar seu anjo. As oito em ponto [redacted_name] estava no estacionamento do hospital, a hora de visitas seria de oito às oito e meia pela manhã e à tarde das dezesseis às dezesseis e trinta e ele estaria lá nos dois horários. Ao dar entrada no quarto de [redacted_name], notou que seu anjo estava com os cabelos úmidos provavelmente teria tomado banho com a ajuda das enfermeiras, seus olhinhos estavam fechados, e se lembrou que o doutor o manteria relaxado com a ajuda dos remédios, não deixou de beijar a testa alva e ver que um sorriso mesmo que mínimo surgiu no rosto um pouco mais pálido que o normal.
trans: He ended up going to bed and was startled awake by the alarm clock. It was already seven in the morning. With the store opening at nine, he planned to first visit his angel at the hospital. By eight o'clock sharp, he was parked in the hospital lot. Visiting hours were strickly from eight to eight-thirty in the morning and again from four to four-thirty in the afternoon, and he intended to be there for both. Entering [redacted_name]'s room, he noticed his angel's hair was damp, likely from a shower assisted by the nurses. His eyes remained closed, a sign that the doctor had kept him sedated with medication. Leaning in, he kissed his pale forehead, and to his relief, a faint smile appeared on his lips, subtle but unmistakable.
